travelSection.title: BEN THANH
travelSection.subTitle: Market
travelSection.description: Being a bustling market in the daytime and a social center after sunset, Ben Thanh Market is absolutely a must-see attraction of the most dynamic city of Vietnam.

travelSection.title: CU CHI
travelSection.subTitle: Tunnels
travelSection.description: Don’t worry if you don’t fancy squeezing into the tunnels yourself – it’s not for everyone and it certainly won’t take away from your Cu Chi Tunnels experience if you don’t!

travelSection.title: MEKONG DELTA
travelSection.subTitle: Tour
travelSection.description: This tour involves a two-hour drive from Ho Chi Minh City, which is a little more than some tours. Bear in mind it’s worth the extra distance to get further off the tourist track.

columns.heading: Convenience Booking
columns.description: Just only one click from our application, you can go everywhere you want. Our application helps building the connection between us and travellers.

columns.heading: Professional Guiders
columns.description: Our tour guiders are friendly, knowledgeable and enthusiasm. Connect to us for the thorough understanding of Vietnamese people's hospitality.

columns.heading: Attractive Tours
columns.description: Our tours are variable in both quality and quantity. Discover the beauty of nature, learn about the history and understand the long-lived tradition of Vietnam in the way you want.

stepSection.title: How can you connect with us ?
stepSection.subtitle: Easy to go everywhere
